FX Data Check
=============

The process of downloading forex data from my broker is a bit tedious, at any point in time I only have access to the last 2 weeks of tick history. 


```{r}
library(ggplot2)

files <- c("EURUSD-Ask-0622-0718",
           "EURUSD-Bid-0622-0718",
           "EURJPY-Ask-0622-0718",
           "EURJPY-Bid-0622-0718",
           "USDJPY-Ask-0620-0718",
           "USDJPY-Bid-0620-0718")

plotTs <- function(filename) {
  d <- read.table(paste("./", filename, ".txt", sep=""), sep=";", quote="\"")
  d$dt <- as.POSIXct(d$V1,format="%Y%m%d %H%M%S")
  ggplot(d,aes(dt,V2)) + geom_line() + xlab("Date/time") + ylab("Rate") + ggtitle(filename)
}

for( filename in files ){
  print(filename)
  plotTs(filename)
}

```
